TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LocalEseStoreSettings extends System.Fabric.LocalStoreSettings
Public NotInheritable Class LocalEseStoreSettings Inherits LocalStoreSettings
public ref class LocalEseStoreSettings sealed : System::Fabric::LocalStoreSettings

summary.para: Represents the optional settings for a local ESE store.

remarks.para: Please see HYPERLINK "http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/gg294139(v=exchg.10).aspx" http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/gg294139(v=exchg.10).aspx for documentation on ESE parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.para: Creates and initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.CompactionThresholdInMB : int with get, set
public: property int CompactionThresholdInMB { int get(); void set(int value); };
public: property int CompactionThresholdInMB { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the minimum file size of a database for offline compaction to occur during open.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.DatabasePageSizeInKB : int with get, set
public: property int DatabasePageSizeInKB { int get(); void set(int value); };
public: property int DatabasePageSizeInKB { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Maps directly to JET_paramDatabasePageSize on the local ESE store.
Docs.value: Returns the database page size in KB.
Docs.remarks: The specified database page size is only applied to newly created databases. Existing databases will continue to use the database page sizes they were created with if different from this setting.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.DbFolderPath : string with get, set
public: property System::String ^ DbFolderPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
public: property Platform::String ^ DbFolderPath { Platform::String ^ get(); void set(Platform::String ^ value); };

summary.para: Gets or sets the file path that contains the local store files.

value.para: The file path that contains the local store files.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.DefragThresholdInMB : int with get, set
public: property int DefragThresholdInMB { int get(); void set(int value); };
public: property int DefragThresholdInMB { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the minimum logical size of a database for online defragmentation to occur the background.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.EnableIncrementalBackup : bool with get, set
public: property bool EnableIncrementalBackup { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
public: property bool EnableIncrementalBackup { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the incremental backup feature is enabled for use.

Docs.value: Returns true if incremental backup is enabled; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.EnableOverwriteOnUpdate : bool with get, set
public: property bool EnableOverwriteOnUpdate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
public: property bool EnableOverwriteOnUpdate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Enables in-place replace of value (versus insert/delete) during update operation. Maps to JET_bitSetOverwriteLV on the local ESE store.
Docs.value: Returns true if overwrite on update is enabled; otherwise, false.
Docs.remarks:
Enabling this setting is useful in cases where certain access patterns can cause the ESE database file to grow on disk even though the logical data size remains same. For example, a large number of transactions getting rolled back or a series of updates made by some transactions while other transactions remain open as updates are happening.
Note that enabling this setting may increase version store usage and the value of may need to be increased.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.IntrinsicValueThresholdInBytes : int with get, set
public: property int IntrinsicValueThresholdInBytes { int get(); void set(int value); };
public: property int IntrinsicValueThresholdInBytes { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum value size at which updates will occur with the JET_bitSetIntrinsicLV flag. Setting this to a non-positive value will use the ESE default of 1024 bytes.

public: static System::Fabric::LocalEseStoreSettings ^ LoadFrom(System::Fabric::CodePackageActivationContext ^ codePackageActivationContext, System::String ^ configPackageName, System::String ^ sectionName);

Docs.param: The activation context under which this code is running. Retrieved from .
The name of the configuration package (specified in the Service Manifest) containing the settings to load.
The name of the section in Settings.xml within the specified configuration package containing the settings to load.
Docs.summary: Convenience method to create an instance of this class initialized with property values loaded from the application configuration package.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.LogBufferSizeInKB : int with get, set
public: property int LogBufferSizeInKB { int get(); void set(int value); };
public: property int LogBufferSizeInKB { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.para: Maps to JET_paramLogBuffers on the local ESE store. There is a conversion from KB to 512 bytes (volume sector size) in the mapping.

value.para: The log buffer size in KB.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.LogFileSizeInKB : int with get, set
public: property int LogFileSizeInKB { int get(); void set(int value); };
public: property int LogFileSizeInKB { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.para: Maps directly to JET_paramLogFileSize on the local ESE store.

value.para: The log file size in KB.

Docs.remarks: The specified log file size is only applied to newly created databases. Existing databases will continue to use the log file sizes they were created with if different from this setting.

summary.para: Maps directly to the cmsecDurableCommit parameter on the JetCommitTransaction2() ESE API calls when local commits are performed.

Docs.summary: Maps directly to JET_paramCacheSizeMax on the local ESE store.
Docs.value: Returns the maximum database cache size in MB.
